Articles.Content: Yeah I'm excited for both these things. I understand why they're doing work on the careermode but it doesn't interest me that much. I really hope to see some stuff that'll influence the sandbox mode in the coming updates, like stock versions of docking cam/alignment indicator, movable parts and resources so up till now I was secretly a bit disappointed but I'm happy with the Subassembly and the Science...
When can we expect to see this update?

The tech tree gives me that nice, warm, nostalgic Civilization feel

Also looking forward to official subassemblies and the science modules.

The update will be released when it's done.

Five minutes later...

Can't... Wait... For update... Any... longer... *explodes*

When can we expect to see this update?

Please don't.

The update will be released when it's done.Five minutes later...Can't... Wait... For update... Any... longer... *explodes*
I know! That was what it was like for 0.20 as well; seeing all the sneak previews definitely makes waiting so much harder.

Squad tortures us with these sneak peaks but they're just too...

Awesome
Thanks for posting the link. I'm very excited about the new parts like the science module; the tech tree; and what sounds like the need to set up communications arrays.
Best part of the livestream: The new logo with the very cool rocket launch leading into it.
Squad, why must you torture us with all this amazing footage?

Best part of the livestream: The new logo with the very cool rocket launch leading into it.

Epic, huh?
subassemblies!!!! science!!!! I love this game more every single day...
This is just as exciting as .18, .17, or .16!
after watching the PAX stream I want I want to see new "keyboard technology" on the tech tree.

Oh this may just bring back my interest in KSP, well I still have intrest in KSP just got side tracked with other games lol

Can't wait for this update!!
Looks nice! Subassemblies will be great. Hopefully, this update will also include a CTRL-Z function in the VAB, as well

Looks nice! Subassemblies will be great. Hopefully, this update will also include a CTRL-Z function in the VAB, as well

There already is a CTRL-Z function. It undoes what you did.

I really want that science stuff. Sub assembly stuff will be good, but I can live without it if I get cool science stuff!

Hopefully now that 0.22 has been unveiled feature-wise at PAX, there will be a bit more detail (from testers with pre-releases maybe) in the weekly since the twitch stream was a bit, uhh, short (in both time, and detail).
looking forward to the science modules, subassemblies will be nice also.
I kind of hope they make it so you have to research the EVA-packs through the tech tree. It would make those early-game missions more unique, and it would make for a good milestone in your research.

As for the science module, I'm also hoping they make smaller versions for the probes as well. At least for the minimalists, we can actually fit them on robotic rovers without making them look really huge and misproportioned.

Maybe they collect data slower or collect less of it, to make up for the size.
I REAAAALY hope that that Graphic at the start of the stream will be part of the game. It's awesome

Can I have it now?

Please?

On a serious note, I do hope they take time on this one, I'm expecting to be a few bugs with the tech tree because no modder (as far as I can tell) has attempted a tech tree in this fashon
I just can't understand how Squad can deliver updates that are always super exiting and they always change way to play KSP.

I hope the old saves will be compatible. I'd hate to lose my progress. So far it worked fine when transferred through two or three versions...

Probably. However Tech tree will only be available in Career Mode. Sandbox will have everything unlocked.

That's my understanding anyhow.
